lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil DTE PM™
products.information: High performance paper machine lubricant
products.benefits: Excellent gear and bearing protection; keep clean performance; excellent filterability and demulsibility

products.name: Mobil SHC™ PM
products.information: Supreme performance synthetic paper machine system lubricant
products.benefits: Highest level of gear and bearing protection under wide operating temperature conditions compared to mineral oils.  Long oil life, resistance to deposit formations and excellent filterability

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high mechanical stability helps provide extended relubrication intervals; resistance to water contamination aids in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ PM
products.information: High performance synthetic lithium-complex grease
products.benefits: Wide operating temperature range/ wear protection; extended lubrication interval; resistance to water washout

products.name: Mobil Centaur™ XHP 221
products.information: High performance calcium complex grease for wet paper machine applications
products.benefits: Extended bearing life through excellent rust and corrosion protection in wet paper machine environments

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Premium quality electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Helps extend bearing life to improve electric motor reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High performance synthetic electronic motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; extended regreasing interval - reduced service cost

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ PM
products.information: High performance synthetic lithium-complex grease
products.benefits: Wide operating temperature range/ wear protection; extended lubrication interval; resistance to water washout

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 1500
products.information: High performance lithium complex grease
products.benefits: High viscosity base oil and advanced thickener system ideally suited to protect heavily loaded geared couplings in low speed high load applications

products.name: Mobilux™ EP 111
products.information: Lithium coupling grease, meeting AGMA CG-1 and CG-3
products.benefits: Helps to maximize coupling life by resisting separation and protecting against wear

products.name: Mobilgrease™ XTC
products.information: High speed coupling grease meeting AGMA CG-2
products.benefits: Helps to maximize coupling reliability and life due to its adhesive, low bleed and high temperature stability properties

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oils
products.benefits: Improved operational reliability; extended oil life; improved equipment energy efficiency compared to mineral oils

products.name: Mobilgear SHC™
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load-carrying and anti wear properties to assist with improving equipment reliability and life; can replace grease in some applications; high viscosity index and low traction properties helps improve equipment energy efficiency compared to mineral oils

products.name: Mobilgear SHC™ XMP
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Potential to improve equipment energy efficiency compared to mineral oils; helps minimize effects of scuffing and micropitting to assist with improving equipment reliability and life; compatible with wide range of gearbox seal materials

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP
products.information: Premium quality EP gear oil
products.benefits: Micropitting performance, bearing protection, and seal compatibility helps to improve gearbox performance and life

products.benefits: Highest level of gear and bearing protection under wide operating temperature conditions compared to mineral oils.  Long oil life, resistance to deposit formations and excellent filterability
